alert.note: Alert for Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 8:09AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm winds will impact portions of central Tulare and eastern Fresno Counties through 845 AM PST... At 806 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from 23 miles northeast of Woodlake to 6 miles southwest of Three Rivers to near Woodville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Multiple surface observations reporting strong winds and brief heavy rain. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Shallow rooted trees in saturated soils could be toppled. Locations impacted include... Porterville, Lindsay, Terra Bella, Ducor, East Porterville, Strathmore, Three Rivers, Poplar-Cotton Center, Woodville, Tipton, Bearpaw Ranger Station, Pixley, Oak Opening, Chagoopa Plateau, Cold Springs Campground, Wolverton Point, Tyndall Creek Ranger Station, Ash Mountain Sequoia Park HQ, Quinn Patrol Cabin and Buckeye Flat Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
